title: Christian Horner set for F1 return? Team boss officially departs Red Bull after settlement
summary: Christian Horner has now officially left Red Bull after the former F1 team principal finally reached a settlement with his former employer

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Christian Horner lead as team principal before his departure?
What role did Christian Horner hold at Red Bull Racing?
What is a common reason for a team principal to leave their position in Formula 1?
